overview: Sweetheart's newest older/younger series continues with more passionate age-play and beautiful pairings. Older female Sargeant Deauxma befriends young Nicole Ray when the petite blonde's husband goes off to war. But when Deauxma learns that Nicole is being sexually harassed by a ranking officer, she encourages the girl to report it immediately. The only problem is, nympho Nicole isn't sure she wants it to stop.Older beauty Melissa Monet patiently tutors young Evie Delatossa as the curvy brunette prepares to take the Bar exam. But lusty Melissa suspects young Evie is better suited for different activities - namely, lesbian lovemaking. Magdalene St. Michaels is a mercurial woman taking a holiday at a quaint bed and breakfast. Young stripper Mia Presley is sick of older blonde Misty Stone stealing all the customers. But when she confronts the gorgeous older woman in the dressing room, Misty knows just how to handle her sexy young coworker.
title: Lesbian Mentors 2
